Chap. 61 - The Vital Function of God's Laws

(A) The Decalogue

     The knowledge of Guilt.--The knowledge which God did not want our first parents to have was a knowledge of guilt. And when they accepted the assertions of Satan, which were false, disobedience and transgression were introduced into our world. This disobedience to God's express command, this belief of Satan's lie, opened the floodgates of woe upon the world.--RH, Apr 5, 1898.
